xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
## wizard ## batchimport.import.title=Import data in application "{0}" ## Step upload file ## batchimport.import.choosefile.title=Choose a file batchimport.import.choosefile.uploadfile=Upload batchimport.import.choosefile.previous=None batchimport.import.choosefile.next=Select file ## Step mapping ## batchimport.import.mapping.title=Column mapping batchimport.import.mapping.fields=Class fields batchimport.import.mapping.columns=Columns in the file batchimport.import.mapping.none=- batchimport.import.mapping.doc.name=Document name batchimport.import.mapping.doc.title=Document title batchimport.import.mapping.doc.space=Document space batchimport.import.mapping.doc.parent=Document parent batchimport.import.mapping.doc.content=Document content batchimport.import.mapping.doc.file=Document attachments batchimport.import.mapping.doc.tags=Document tags batchimport.import.mapping.error.exception=An error occurred while trying to read the columns from the file: batchimport.import.mapping.error.noexception=An unknown error occurred while trying to read the columns from the file. batchimport.import.mapping.previous=Change file batchimport.import.mapping.next=Confirm mapping ## Step overwrite ## batchimport.import.overwrite.title=Data deduplication and overwrite batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.explanation=If by any chance, the column chose for document name does not contain unique names, what should happen to the **duplicate rows**? batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.option.skip=Ignore batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.option.update=Update: use the data as part of the other rows with the same document name (if the same column is set on multiple rows, the last one will win). batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.option.generate_new=Generate a new document name, by adding a number at the end of the document name batchimport.import.overwrite.explanation=If then, for the document name built as indicated above, a document already exists in the wiki with that name, what should we to the **existing document in the wiki**? batchimport.import.overwrite.option.skip=Leave unchanged (ignore data from the file) batchimport.import.overwrite.option.update=Update with the data coming from the file (the fields mapped on the columns of the file will be updated, the rest will remain unchanged) batchimport.import.overwrite.option.replace=Replace with the data coming from the file (the existing document will be deleted and a new one will be created instead, containing only the data in the file) batchimport.import.overwrite.option.generate_new=Generate a new document name, by adding a number at the end of the document name built as indicated above. Note that 2 subsequent imports with this option checked will not yield the same results since the document names used depend on the documents existing on the wiki. batchimport.import.overwrite.previous=Change mapping batchimport.import.overwrite.next=Do an import simulation ## Step simulation ## batchimport.import.importsimulation.title=Import simulation batchimport.import.importsimulation.errorlog=Errors batchimport.import.importsimulation.fulllog=Full log batchimport.import.importsimulation.error.exception=An error occurred while executing import simulation: batchimport.import.importsimulation.error.noexception=An unknown error occurred while executing import simulation. batchimport.import.importsimulation.previous=Change overwrite options batchimport.import.importsimulation.next=Import ## Step real import ## batchimport.import.import.title=Import batchimport.import.import.errorlog=Errors batchimport.import.import.fulllog=Full log batchimport.import.import.error.exception=An error occurred while importing data: batchimport.import.import.error.noexception=An unknown error occurred while importing data. batchimport.import.import.backtowebhome=Go to "{0} Welcome" ## delete existing data ## batchimport.delete.title=Delete existing data of application "{0}" batchimport.delete.success=Successfully deleted data: batchimport.delete.success.backtowebhome=Back to {0} batchimport.delete.error.exception=An error occurred while deleting data: batchimport.delete.error.noexception=An unknown error occurred while deleting data. batchimport.delete.error.backtowebhome=Back to {0} batchimport.delete.confirmation.description=Are you sure you want to delete all the data of the application "{0}"? batchimport.delete.confirmation.submit=Delete batchimport.delete.confirmation.cancel=Cancel batchimport.delete.error.noclass=Cannot delete data: no type of data was specified.
## logs ## batchimport.log.checkingzip=Checking zip file {0} batchimport.log.cannotopenzip=Could not open zip file {0} batchimport.log.checkingdatadir=Checking data directory {0} batchimport.log.cannotopendatadir=Could not open data directory {0} batchimport.log.import=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] without file. batchimport.log.simimport=Line {0}: Ready to import row {1} in page {2} without file. batchimport.log.ignoreduplicate=Line {0}: Ignore {1} because page name was already used in this import. batchimport.log.ignoreemptypagename=Line {0}: Ignore {1} because page name is empty or could not be built. batchimport.log.done=Processing finished. batchimport.log.toreplace=Line {0}: Removed document {2} to replace with line {1} batchimport.log.simtoreplace=Line {0}: Removing document {2} to replace with line {1} batchimport.log.ignorealreadyexists=Line {0}: Cannot import row {1} because page {2} already exists. batchimport.log.simimportfileok=Line {0}: Ready to import row {1} in page {2} and imported file {3} is ok. batchimport.log.importduplicateattach=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] without file {3} since it already exists. batchimport.log.importfiledir=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] and attached all files in the {3} directory. batchimport.log.importofficefail=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] but failed importing office file {3} into content. batchimport.log.importoffice=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] and imported office file {3} into content. batchimport.log.importnooffice=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] and did not need to import the office file. batchimport.log.importcannotreadfile=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]] and failed to read the office file. batchimport.log.errornofile=Line {0}: Cannot import row {1} in page {2} because imported file {3} does not exist. batchimport.log.simimportnofile=Line {0}: Ready to import row {1} in page {2} (no file attached). batchimport.log.importnofile=Line {0}: Imported row {1} in page [[{2}]].
batchimport.log.importfail=Line {0}: Failed to import line {1} to document {2} because of unknown error: "{3}"
batchimport.log.delete=Deleted document {0} from wiki {1} batchimport.log.deletefail=Failed to delete document {0} from wiki {1} becauseof unknown error : "{2}"
## validation errors ## batchimport.log.errorvalidationlength=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: value "{5}" on column "{4}" is too long for field "{3}" (max length is {6}). batchimport.log.errorvalidationlengthdocfullname=Line {0}: Validation error on row %s: full name of document (\"%s\") too long (max length is %s). batchimport.log.errorvalidationnoobject=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot create object of type {3} in document {2}. batchimport.log.errorvalidationtypeboolean=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot convert value "{5}" on column "{4}" to boolean for field "{3}" (accepted values are ''true'', ''false'', ''1'' or ''0''). batchimport.log.errorvalidationtypeinteger=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot convert value "{5}" on column "{4}" to integer for field "{3}" (incorrect format or value out of range). batchimport.log.errorvalidationtypelong=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot convert value "{5}" on column "{4}" to long for field "{3}" (incorrect format or value out of range). batchimport.log.errorvalidationtypefloat=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot convert value "{5}" on column "{4}" to float for field "{3}" (incorrect format or value out of range). batchimport.log.errorvalidationtypedouble=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot convert value "{5}" on column "{4}" to double for field "{3}" (incorrect format or value out of range). batchimport.log.errorvalidationtypedate=Line {0}: Validation error on row {1}: cannot convert value "{5}" on column "{4}" to date for field "{3}" (accepted format is {6}).
